name: Trapped Buildbox 3D Game Template
description:
Get Out of the building floor before you get Trapped !

Make a beautiful and interesting hyper casual game using this excellent Buildbox 3D Template. Trapped is a casual game where you must help the character to get out of the trapped building floor unlocking every rooms in the floor. it belongs to hyper casual game genre.

There is a room for improvement and one could create amazing games using this game play.

Trapped Buildbox 3D Game Template Key Features :
  • A 3D Hyper Casual Game Genre
  • 6 3D Characters + 6 3D Character Animation
  • Coin Shop where players could unlock new characters
  • Level Selectors with random and endless level mode
  • Simple game control especially one hand joystick control 
  • Beautiful animation and particles
  • Level design by Govind Narayan (TheGameAppStudio) and character and objects by Kenney
Requirements :
  • Active Buildbox Subscription
Ways to improve this template :
  • Add more interesting levels
  • In-App purchase to buy new character and more game coins
  • A reward video to award players with gifts 
  • and much more
Games that you could make with this template :
  • A stealth mode game
  • A room escape game
  • Hide and seek game
  • A maze game
  • and much more

Note : You would get only the .Bbdoc file with this purchase which has all elements used in this game. If you need more 3d assets go to this link . Once this game template has been purchased there will be no refund instead I could assist you on clearing your doubts. In case you would like to improve this game hire me. Use one of the links below to contact me.
